column4: anyone here able to fix the adobe flash player keep on crashing on ubuntu lucid 64bit?
[84050.107849] npviewer.bin[30765]: segfault at 418 ip 00000000f6036a56 sp 00000000ffa53978 error 6 in libflashplayer.so[f5de8000+b04000]
on what site?
there's no specific site..
as long as the site is accessing flash
it just crashed on any flash site? can you view video in youtube?
yes. the side effect is on the user's perspective, it is very slow then it will eat a lot of cpu load
which method you're using to install flash?
everything package installed on my system were installed using apt-get
sudo apt-get install flashplugin-installer?
yes, including flashplugin-nonfree
driver problem maybe?
i don't think it's a driver problem
hmm, I'm here on linux mint 9 (10.04 derivative) with mint-flashplugin-installer-x64, which is flash 10.0.42.2...
what i have is 10.1.53.64ubuntu0.10.04.1
the ubuntu version is 10.1.53
maybe the new version is problematic?
which is even newer
maybe.. but i need proof.. but, you're not encountering any problem on your flash, right? you will normally found it out when you execute "dmesg"
smooth sailing here with 10.0
isn't 10.1 use GPU to unload some of the workload from CPU
i don't know.. actually, i'm a 3 days old ubuntu user and i finally decided to use it in an office network as ltsp x terminal server
